long_description: Take to trails or cross concrete jungles in the ECCO Yucatan sport sandals, which offer support and comfort in a lightweight, flexible design that easily adjusts for a custom fit. Durable nubuck leather uppers are flexible and comfortable; rip-and-stick straps at toes, insteps and heels adjust to personalize the fit. Soft spandex and nylon linings wick moisture off of feet and dry quickly for a comfortable feel. Soft polyester microfiber-covered EVA footbeds add cushioning and feature an AgION(TM) treatment to help keep odors at bay. Direct-inject polyurethane midsoles feature full-length, hard EVA shanks to support your feet and still allow you to feel the terrain. Rubber outsoles on the ECCO Yucatan sport sandals deliver solid traction on wet and dry surfaces. Proudly carries the Seal of Acceptance from the American Podiatric Medical Association.
short_description: Take to trails or cross concrete jungles in the ECCO Yucatan sport sandals, which offer support and comfort in a lightweight, flexible design that easily adjusts for a custom fit.
